channel.title: HKG:3988 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:3988 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China’s Central Bank Extends Gold Buying Spree to 10 Months
item.description: The People’s Bank of China increased its gold holdings in August for a 10th month, in a continued push to diversify its reserves away from US dollars.

item.title: China’s Central Bank Extends Gold Buying Spree to 10 Months
item.description: The People’s Bank of China increased its gold holdings in August for a 10th month, in a continued push to diversify its reserves away from US dollars.

item.title: China’s Central Bank Adds Gold In Nine-Month Buying Streak
item.description: People’s Bank of China increased its gold reserve in July, marking nine straight months of purchases that are helping it diversify its holdings away from US dollars.

item.title: China’s Central Bank Adds Gold In Nine-Month Buying Streak
item.description: People’s Bank of China increased its gold reserve in July, marking nine straight months of purchases that are helping it diversify its holdings away from US dollars.
